    • Constructor Detail

      • LanguageAnalyzer

        protected LanguageAnalyzer()
        Constructs a new LanguageAnalyzer. Initializes a new FileTokenizer that is ready to have tokenizeFile(String) called from it.

      • LanguageAnalyzer

        protected LanguageAnalyzer(java.lang.String filename)
                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Constructs a new LanguageAnalyzer and immediately attempts to tokenize the file. Calls analyzeFile(String).
        Parameters:
        filename - name of the file to be analyzed
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file could not be found
        java.io.IOException - if the file could not be read

      • analyzeClass

        protected abstract void analyzeClass()
                              throws FileFormatException
        Analyzes whole classes. Depending upon the language, this method should call analyzeAttribute() and/or analyzeOperation() one or more times.
        Throws:
        FileFormatException - if the analyzer encounters an unexpected formatting error
        Precondition:
        TODO
        Postcondition:
        Must have created a PolyClass object in this object's polyClass member.

      • analyzeAttribute

        protected abstract void analyzeAttribute()
                                  throws FileFormatException
        Analyzes attributes. Depending upon the language, this method may call analyzeVisibility(), analyzeMfrConstant(), analyzeMfrAbstract(), analyzeMfrStatic(), and/or analyzeDataType(), and must call analyzeIdentifier().
        Throws:
        FileFormatException - if the analyzer encounters an unexpected formatting error
        Precondition:
        TODO
        Postcondition:
        Must have added a PolyOperation object to this object's polyClass member.

      • analyzeOperation

        protected abstract void analyzeOperation()
                                  throws FileFormatException
        Analyzes operations. Depending upon the language, this method may call #analyzeVisibility(), analyzeVisibility(), analyzeMfrConstant(), analyzeMfrAbstract(), analyzeMfrStatic(), and/or analyzeDataType(), and must call analyzeIdentifier() and analyzeReturns().
        Throws:
        FileFormatException - if the analyzer encounters an unexpected formatting error
        Precondition:

        Postcondition:
